Vote allows a voter to vote on a proposal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}

  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"MsgVote is the Msg/Vote request type.","type":"object","properties":{"exec":{"description":"exec defines whether the proposal should be executed\nimmediately after voting or not.","type":"string","default":"EXEC_UNSPECIFIED","enum":["EXEC_UNSPECIFIED","EXEC_TRY"]},"metadata":{"description":"metadata is any arbitrary metadata attached to the vote.","type":"string"},"option":{"description":"option is the voter's choice on the proposal.","type":"string","default":"VOTE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED","enum":["VOTE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED","VOTE_OPTION_YES","VOTE_OPTION_ABSTAIN","VOTE_OPTION_NO","VOTE_OPTION_NO_WITH_VETO"]},"proposal_id":{"description":"proposal is the unique ID of the proposal.","type":"string","format":"uint64"},"voter":{"description":"voter is the voter account address.","type":"string"}}}}},"description":"MsgVote is the Msg/Vote request type.","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
